message: Hey Bob, I think it's fair to start with a 90/10 split.  Let's see if we can come to a mutually agreeable solution.
Let's try a more balanced split, 60/40 seems fair to me.
I'm willing to go down to 70/30, Bob. This is getting a bit risky, so let's try to come to an agreement.
I'm willing to compromise, 55/45 is a fair split considering the inflation.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle.  60/40 is my final offer.  We're losing a lot of money with every passing round, so let's make a deal.
